Chefman TurboFry XL Air Fryer

Extra-large air fryer designed for cooking bigger portions with simple, no-fuss controls.

View on Amazon

Specifications

  • Capacity: 8 qt
  • Power: 1700 W
  • Temperature range: 200–400°F
  • Basket type: Nonstick, rectangular
  • Controls: Manual dial
  • Dishwasher safe parts: Yes
  • Warranty: 1 year
  • Noise level: Moderate
